alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Oldham (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 5:00PM EDT until May 21 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL JEFFERSON...EASTERN CLARK...WESTERN OLDHAM AND CENTRAL JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 458 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Madison to Louisville, moving east at 45 mph. A 60 mph gust was recorded at Bowman Field in Louisville, Kentucky. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Automated Weather Station. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Louisville, Jeffersonville, Jeffersontown, St. Matthews, Lyndon, Middletown, Douglass Hills, Prospect, Hurstbourne and Graymoor-Devondale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
